translations: 吉娃娃（一种产于墨西哥的狗）；奇瓦瓦（墨西哥北部的州及其首府名称）

sentences.sentence: Too much deprecation will make a Chihuahua dog.
sentences.translation: 过度贬低会使人变得像吉娃娃一样。

sentences.sentence: If you do it too often, you can transform in the eyes of others from a confident joker to a Chihuahua dog.
sentences.translation: 但如果你频繁这样做，在别人的眼中，你就会从一个自信的小丑变成滑稽的吉娃娃狗。

sentences.sentence: Well, I think my chihuahua just killed him...
sentences.translation: 哦，我想我的吉娃娃刚要了它的命……
